short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced Security Logging. All rights reserved.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps in enhancing the security logging. 
No private data nor sensitive information is handled, collected or processed. Works with only iLogSafe app on desktop/mobile and published url in the manifest. For general information please visit https://ilogsafe.com .  Joining V3 bandwagon on chrome extension. Thank you.
